item.title: Report I-2023090104
item.description:
Report I-2023090104

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-05T00:33:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-18
  • City: LOWELL
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: TRIUMVIRATE ENVIRONMENTAL, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: A Sharp object punctured the container, leaving a small hole on the bottom of the container. Some material was absorbed into the pallet and puddled on the floor. Approximately 4 gallons were released.
